Class ScriptUtil

    ScriptUtil - enables executing scripts from within a Java plug-in

      • runScript

        public static java.lang.String runScript(java.lang.String script,
                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> args)
                                  throws com.exlibris.digitool.exceptions.ScriptException
        Parameters:
        script - full path of the script file
        args - the arguments list
        Returns:
        script output
        Throws:
        com.exlibris.digitool.exceptions.ScriptException -

        For example :
        String scriptOutput = ScriptUtil.runScript("C:\\MyProgram\\scriptForExample.sh", Arrays.asList("myPicture.jpg", "64"));
